Class CheckInCheckOutController

  • Object
    • PersistenceController
      • CheckInCheckOutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class CheckInCheckOutController
extends PersistenceController
    CheckInCheckOutController is a controller that performs check-in check-out operations.
    Author:
    YingHao

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkin(View view, List<Reservation> reservations)
      Performs check in for all the reservations present in the specified list and prints out the respective room numbers.
      private void checkout(View view, List<Reservation> reservations)
      Performs check out for all the reservations present in the specified list and prints out the bill.

      Finds a vacant and available room that fits the criteria of the specified reservation.
